name: IT Engineer
description:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Work with the area business units and country IT Manager to define requirements and supporting plans to meet the requirements
  • Performs account management for all network/voice systems (Win Srv, Vmware, SAN, MS SQL, Remote Access, PBXs etc).
  • Execute IT service requests and resolve incidents reported by the employees and other IT teams
  • Performs day-to-day tasks and procedures for Backup of all network data resources.
  • Act as a connector between end-users and Global IT
  • Work with vendors to assist in resolving requests and incidents if required.
  • Ensure that the IT Security is implemented at the LAN/Voice network, Server and workstation level by applying the International SOS Standards.
  • Perform design, planning & installation of LANs, this includes wiring/hubs, Servers and workstations to company defined Standards (including Standard Desktop & Servers configurations).
  • Provide first and second line support WAN/VPN/Voice Net and first line support for Corp. Applications, local applications and EUC support.
  • Work within strict time frames and elevate incidents within defined timeframes.
  • Support the country IT manager during project implementation and new initiative roll outs.
  • Keep all internal IT processes & procedures fully documented and safe.
  • Monitor systems for alerts and other anomalies.

Required Skills/Knowledge:

  • English language.
  • Service Orientated
  • Mandatory technical skills: administering Win 2003 and above, Exchange, IIS, DHCP, WINS, DNS servers; experience working with switches and routers, Dell/HP servers and workstations; knowledge of TCP/IT stack and MS office application suite, basic knowledge of Unix/Linux OS’s and application suits, knowledge of modern IT technologies. Basic functionality/administration of Siemens/Avaya Nortel PBXs.
  • Good communication skills.
  • Ability to communicate effectively both within the International SOS organization and with external contacts
  • Ability to prioritize
  • Ability to provide clear and concise written updates

Required Work Experience

  • At least 2 - 3 years of practical work in the field of IT and IT support (at user, system and network level)
  • Experience of working in a call centre environment a distinct advantage

Required Qualifications

  • Higher technical education in the field of IT or electronics
  • CCNA/MCSE/MSP a distinct advantage

Conditions:

  • Working schedule: Monday-Friday 9-18
  • Office location: near m. Botanichesky Sad (м. Ботанический сад)
  • Employment: according to the legislation of the Russian Federation
  • Benefits: medical insurance
  • Competitive salary

Dear candidates! Please send your CV in English!
